GSD.description:
scsi: myrs: Fix crash in error case

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.16.10 by commit 1d6cd26605b4d662063a83c15c776b5299a1cb23. For more details please see the references link.
